name: Melascrivi
tag_list: content-marketplace, melascrivi, market-place, writers, publisher, freelancers, blogger
overview:
Melascrivi is a platform of unique content created by expert authors following specific writing performance with the intent to increase the search engines. Publishers in need of content for websites, blog, press releases will find in Melascrivi a partner ready to answer quickly to all the requests. A large number of authors are waiting for writing for you.

Melascrivi is an excellent source of profit for Freelancers who have a passion for writing. There are no limits of time or place. The more efficient will be the content of the articles the more the source of gain will increase. The better you write the more you earn! You must not be a journalist or a professional writer but itâ€™s obligatory to write with perfect spelling and grammar.
